page.title: 08Val Doonican
page.content: Val Doonican,the mumÂ£s hearthrob lives at Long Grove Lane,Seer Green,Bucks.He said modestly that not many people come pestering him for autographs now,but when he first moved in he was very popular. He announced that he loves his job as a singer on his own show.1985 will be his 23rd year working on T.V.,but if he had to change his occupation he would be a composer. His house which is fairly big and attractive with a swimming pool in the back garden is situated about half a mile from Beaconsfield Golf Course.He often goes there in his spare time.
